# Ignore build output
build/
*.o
*.obj
*.exe
*.dll

# Ignore Qt Creator files
*.user
*.pro.user
.idea/
.vscode/

# Ignore CMake-generated files
CMakeFiles/
CMakeCache.txt
cmake_install.cmake
Makefile

# Ignore qrc-generated and moc files
moc_*
ui_*
qrc_*

# Ignore Qt resource files and backups
*.autosave
*.log
*.swp
*~
